title: 9 RP for mystery skin to my friend :(
body:
yea, i spent some monies to buy some mystery skin for my friends, but I just realised the penguins are so cute, afforded that CUTEST ward skin immediately, and i realized that i need 9 more rp for mystery skin :( (currently have 481)
should i just go buy another 10 bux rp :\

replies.body: Send a support ticket to Riot, and don't for get to ask nicely about getting 9 RP for a gift. Make sure to make a drawing and send it as well- and if you suck at art (like me) maybe write a poem or creative writing piece. (I did that, and got an epic response from Riot)
I guess i'll just have to leave my 481 rp.. not good at doing anything {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ton Chan,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dueex5q1,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-10T03:01:17.306+0000)
>
> I guess i'll just have to leave my 481 rp.. not good at doing anything {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

They will accept a terrible drawing trust me. Especially if you do it in MS pain rofl. Worth a shot =D
well im getting nothing from my friends :/
Pray to Phreak, send your punniest puns.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} If I could gift 9rp I would{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
